text: 🚨New report!🚨 ECDC's Annual Epidemiological Report is out now! 📊👀 It's a series of individual epidemiological disease reports, covering communicable diseases and related health issues under European Union and European Economic Area disease surveillance. 🇪🇺💡 Data was collected in 2015 and submitted electronically by participating countries. 📱💻 Check it out and stay informed! 🤝
